tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Following my root canal procedure with Dr. Minarbha at Smiley House, I was delighted with the results.  Her **** ********** gentle approach, and thoroughness make her an excellent choice for anyone seeking dental care. Thanks to her skillful and pain-free approach, everything went smoothly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Gum Disease Treatment/ Surgery,Tooth Extraction,
review:
I had literally all the dental problems , staring with gum issues , cavities , severe bone infection, tooth loss , its been 10 years I have visited dentist and in Bangalore never been to one so I was not sure where to go and right place for me , then I googled it and come across really amazing reviews about "smiley house " and it's close to my house as well (200mtr) , first visit itself very satisfying to know how well they explained all my dental problems am facing and how to go about the treatment and everything , very kind and friendly everyone in there , Dr minnerva is the best i would say ....now i can feel very fresh about my oral hygiene after getting treated by Dr minnerva .....

You have dental issues just "smiley house " is the right place for you ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
In the time of COVID , I was little scare to go to dental clinic , but due to severe pain in my tooth , I can not resist and visit the clinic.I had one of my colleagues who informed about the clinic and he had a good feedback so I decided to visit the clinic.
  To my surprise , the precaution which the clinic is taking , made me feel comfortable and relax to proceed with the treatment.Dr. Minerva explained took x-ray and after that explained me everything which I can understand .She gave me pain killer and asked me to come next day .Then my procedure started .My procedure was for 4 sitting in in clouding my crown fixing. In the whole treatment , the best things which impressed me that the personal care and follow up about my pain as I had more pain .This is one of my best experience to any doctor so far .
   Thanks a lot Smile House !!
reply_text: Thanks Jaydev

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Minerbha is so friendly, professional and she was able to listen to all our problems and queries very attentively. My wife had a unbearable tooth ache in her decayed wisdom tooth. Dr.Minerbha suggested us with surgery for extraction with a specialist after the scan. Extraction was done by surgeon with so much of ease which shows thier immense experience. we also found the adjacent tooth was infected too , so went ahead with RCT again with a specialist which got completed in single sitting itself. Smiley house clinic is so clean, even during covid time they maintained all precautions to avoid contamination. The price for the treatment is also very reasonable for the standards they provide. overall we are happy with Smiley house dental and Dr.Minerbha.We High recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your Valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our experience with the doctor was very good. Doctor explained about the issue very well . My son was really comfortable with their approach and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had urgent teeth work to be completed. The lead doctor Dr. Minarbha was quick to diagnose and offer treatment options. Despite limited time, she was able to accommodate me and complete all works. She was very flexible to work around my travel time. The dental work is of excellent quality and the Dr was able to clearly explain the process. I am very happy about the appointments and less waiting time.
